name: Low-flying: time attack game and difficult games
name_original: Low-flying: time attack game and difficult games
description:
Operate a drill plane,
A game that aims for faster times!

You can also challenge the world ranking.

How to play
The lower left button moves left and right, and the lower right button is the accelerator.
You will be retired when you run out of hearts.

 World ranking
When you connect to Game Center or Google play game servies
You can challenge the world ranking! Let's aim for the world champion!
